name: didymos-pkm
description: Personal Knowledge Management with AI-powered graph extraction

scripts.package: npm run build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css dist/ && cd dist && zip -r didymos-pkm.zip main.js manifest.json styles.css
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
